title: Support Looking for duo partner
body:
Hey all
Currently in Bronze 2, just looking for someone to duo with. Support main. Want to reach Gold by season end.
Requirements: Have a good attitude, comms (discord, skype, etc), willing to help each other out and be fun :)

Add me in game if you would like a game :)

ForeverASupport

replies.body: Hey man i ADC, MID main, im bronze 2 i have other accounts in higher elo but my main is bronze, very happy to help out, send me an in game request NEC MUSO
Feel free to add me in game, (PatrickArrow) always keen to have other friendly players to duo with :)
you guys platinum is same with bronze in korea i'm silver2 in korea but i'm here for win haha do you join me? I can go everyline
